page.title: 14OPEN DAY
page.content: Once every year, at our school, we have an open day. All the children decorate their classrooms. Then on a special afternoon the parents come to school and see all the childrens work. There are also other activities e.g., swimming, tennis, and games on the football pitch. Beforehand all the children from our school go and visit all the other classes to see their beautiful work. At the end of the afternoon all the children who are going to leave bring their parents to the hall and sit down. Then the head master makes a speech and a special visitor presents all the children from the top class with a book that they choose themselves. This is what Mont Nicolle school is like, on open day in the 1980s .
